item.title: GoogleScholarDatasetVisualization
item.description:
This is the fianl project for CS411 at UIUC. We processed a 10GB database and you can check our website here

  • Built a web application using React, Apollo and GraphQL that can visualize the trends of popular topics and corresponding publications, visualize the most cited authors and articles, find the connections between different authors and search with keywords
  • Utilized Neo4j database to store connections between articles and authors and generalize the list of related articles
  • Visualized the popularity of research topics with a graph to show the number of publications for a selected year and how the number changed in the past decade
  • Displayed the most cited articles on one of the top three trending topics or research interests
